title: Trump grants tariff breaks to 'politically connected' companies, Senate Dems say
description: The White House's trade policy has "opened the door to corruption," according to a letter from Ron Wyden and Chris Van Hollen.
content: The White House's trade policy has "opened the door to corruption," according to a letter from Ron Wyden and Chris Van Hollen.
